content: Wow make your own blood sucking stirrer alright crafters the start Renesas
topiary I bought this at the craft store and it just has a bunch of these little
plants and I use these all the time for making vegetation but I'm gonna actually
use these for the wings of the Sturge right so I cut off two leaves each on a
branch and those will make perfect small little double wings for these surges I
think all right cool so now I'm going to use a toothpick I've bent the toothpick
and broken it off and I'm just gonna put a little glob of glue for the head and
this stuff's kind of like water like it has a surface tension kind of thing as
long as it's molten you know kind of form into a ball so I did like the head
there okay and after that dries I'll hold that and then start the body so
I'll put the top on there and while that's molten I'll pop the little leaves
on there for wings so I'll get them into position alright sweet and then I'll do
the underside you want to make sure to connect both blobs so it looks like a
whole body there and the back there and then I'm going to put it on the base and
stand it up cool alright now I'll just put a little bit
on the top to make sure the wings are secure and do the tail there and it's
ready to go now let's show you how to do that base
alright simple simple okay the base is just a 1/2 inch washer and I'm going to
put a little glob of glue in there and then start building out from that and
get some texture and then poke a tack nail in there and make sure it's secure
and this will make a perfect little stand for this thing right okay now
that's dry our solid I'll pull it off pull off little excess wisp there and
now I'm going to do some edging on the base so just go around
just so it's not totally round let that harden up and now it has a point on the
Technion so I need to take that awesome and use a just a wire cutter and snip
that spike off the top the nail and I got a perfect little stand now I'm gonna
paint it I've spray-painted it flat black and I use this coral color because
they have this weird fleshy color and I want to kind of emulate that so I'm
gonna use this coral color I'd be perfect for these guys paint the body up
be careful not to get it on the stand all right looking good now I'm gonna
paint the base a just a regular grey here because they mostly stay in caves
and that kind of thing so at least that's where I mostly use them so I'll
paint the base like a cave like a stone there you go nice easy enough let that
dry up now I'm going to use this burgundy and do a nice wash on the Serge
and I'll kind of give it some nice coloration and figure out the detail
those those leaf wings and that kind of thing so yeah we're liking that so it's
not just a bright orange there all right now I'm gonna do the eyes I'm going to
use a toothpick and just put some eyes on the sucker just pop them right on the
head there nice looking great alright now I'm gonna do a little dry brushing
our little love highlight on the base the lighter gray on there give some
variation on the base and we are ready for the table wow so easy and quick but
looks coat looks great hey guys so here's the finished surge I
think it looks great the coloring looks really cool a nice little base there and
stand so easy to do the wings look great I didn't put the legs on because I
assume they're tucked up underneath but you could also do that and I think it's
a great little project for doing these surges that are so hard to find as
miniatures hey I hope you find these tips helpful if you did give your old DM
Scottie a thumbs up and that'd be alike also check out my forum and Facebook
group a bunch of wonderful people on there and if you do like these vids
consider tipping there is a little tip thing on the video you can click on that
and tip directly to your DM Scottie and if you want to go take it further than
that you can go to patreon and become a supporter and a member of the family I
have a monthly magazine called the crafters lair which I'll have instant
access to when you become a supporter take care
have fun gaming get out of here your bloodsucker
